【C++】心型名字

Apr 23, 2013 • xjh1994

适用于windowsNT,windows7,8

[sourcecode language=”plain”] #include #include #include #include #include using namespace std; void main() {int m,n,i(0),y,m1,d1,s,m2,d2; string d,f,h; char a[6]; char e; ofstream k; SYSTEMTIME t; GetLocalTime(&t);
